## Description {#details}

Stubs builder emits non-position-independent Arm stubs for pre-v7 CPUs.

These architectures have no MovT/MovW instructions and don&#39;t support Thumb2. BL is the only Thumb instruction that can generate stubs and they can always be transformed into BLX.

Definition at line 346 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/jitlink/aarch32-h">aarch32.h</a>.
